phrases: You have lost contact with Metal Bat?
Yes.
I have already contacted every hero higher than Class A for backup.
The giant monstrous insect Centichoro...
Threat level: Dragon.
It is basically a full-scale disaster.
This is nothing like two years ago.
I am not sure we can defeat it, despite our numbers.
Apparently, King is already fighting something.
What are the other Class S heroes doing?
Urgent messages from the branch offices?
Th-This is...
Damn it!
We are cornered.
At this rate... we are finished.
Wait!
Class S Rank 6 Metal Knight
It is the Class S hero, Metal Knight!
We are saved!
You are in the way!
Weapons tests are not for show.
Leave at once.
S-Sorry!
It is unharmed...
For a living organism, it is extremely tough.
Annoying fly!
Did the centipede thing stop chasing us?
Yeah.
I think we might just make it out of here.
I hope Metal Bat is okay.
Smash
You are not getting away, pro heroes.
Leave that family behind.
Monsters?!
Interesting.
It is been reported that Metal Bat is facing off with Centichoro,
so where is he now?
Unbelievable.
Monsters whose threat levels are Demon and above have randomly appeared
in multiple locations.
We cannot keep up with them.
Martial Arts Tournament
As I figured, you are already pretty beat-up.
I wanted to see just how strong you are,
but I do not think that is going to happen right now.
Do not underestimate me!
You have lost so much blood.
You will probably pass out at any second.
Not to mention you have got multiple fractures.
What is keeping you upright?
Your pride as a hero?
His swings are even faster now.
They are also more powerful.
Do not tell me he is...
No, there is no doubt about it.
The more damage he takes, the more his physical abilities improve.
What is the principle behind your strength?
Who the hell cares about principles?
I am just pumped up.
The hell?
Just come at me already, hero hunter.
I have still got a giant centipede to deal with after I am through with you!
He is still...
Let us see how long you can stay pumped up.
I will play with you for a bit.
I am over here!
Dumbass!
I cannot forgive muggers or hero hunters.
You are rotten to the core, and I will beat that right out of you!
You are not going to hit me, dumbass!
Are you just going to keep swinging that thing around until you die?
Until I die?
I am not that nice.
I will swing it until I win!
Killer Move... Pumped-Up Brutal Tornado!
Brutal Tornado
Huh?
You are just spinning around in circles!
Do not make me laugh!
Unfortunately for you, I can deflect every one of your amateurish blows.
He finally went down.
Tank-Top Master and Metal Bat are both just musclebrains.
They lack hand-to-hand martial arts skills.
Crushing the Hero Association might be easier than I thought.
You have got to be kidding me.
Did his attacks pack more of a punch than I thought?
I might have been in trouble if he would managed to land one on me.
Big Brother!
Big Brother Bat.
What are you doing?
Who is that?
His little sister?
Zenko, stay back!
Big Brother!
You missed the perfect opportunity.
This time, I will finish you off for good!
You cannot!
Big Brother promised me that he would never expose me to violence!
So no more fighting!
Huh?
The fight's over!
And why the hell should I have to follow your family rules?
No more!
Oh, yeah.
I just remembered I had something else to do.
I do not have time to waste on you fools.
You are the one who attacked me!
Guess you get to live a little longer, Metal Bat.
What?!
Big Brother!
Let us hurry up and go home!
There is a giant monster, too.
Oh, right!
That family's in danger.
I have to hurry.
Wait, you are joking, right?
Come on!
Do not do this!
You are going to die!
You go on home, Zenko.
Ugh!
You stubborn oaf!
Huh?
Big Brother?
Hello?
So that is the hero hunter everyone is talking about.
Not bad for a human.
He is a coward for not finishing him off.
No, that guy may actually prove useful, Hedrojellyfish.
Hey, that is Metal Bat's little sister.
The more hostages, the better.
Hey.
So you are the creepy gaze I was sensing.
It is still alive?
Wait a second, hero hunter!
Two on one, eh?
We are not your enemies.
I am sure this will interest you.
The Monster Association?
He took the bait.
Follow me.
I will take you to our lair.
I am not interested.
Get lost.
I will pretend I did not see that.
But we will be meeting again.
As long as you continue hunting heroes, that is.
Just you wait!
Disgusting.
Well, this is a disappointment.
My Mohipunch...
My Pine-a-pow...
Pineapple gets five points.
Smash
Mohican gets two.
That is out of a hundred, by the way.
You are unbelievably weak!
Do you know how much I have trained my horn and this body for the destined day?!
Well, do you?!
Rhino Wrestler, get the hostages!
We are heading back!
What the hell?
We are not fighting Metal Knight?
Correct.
That is just a remote-controlled robot.
Besides, today is not the day.
You are forbidden to act on your own.
Okay, fine.
Are we taking both of these guys?
No, just the kid is enough.
D-Do not!
Damn it!
Metal Bat asked us to watch over them!
We will stop you, even if it kills us!
Okay, you can die, then!
How do you like that, Phoenix Man?
What do you think my threat level is now?
Who knows?
Centichoro, we have fulfilled our objective.
You can fall back!
You are burrowing?
I think not!
I will not let go!
This is fine.
Today is not not the day.
Get him!
You have got this, Heavy Kong!
Damn it...
Backup's not coming.
What the hell is going on?
Are you a Class A hero?
How many of you do I have to kill to raise my threat level?
Monsters my electricity does not affect?
This is not my lucky day.
Class A hero Lightning Genji...
You are actually very lucky.
The other cities are facing much worse.
What the heck is going on?
Charanko (Fist of Water Polo, Carbonation) Green Room
Hey!
You are the only one slacking!
We are supposed to make our entrance now, you moron!
Hurry it up, Charanko!
Okay, let us go.
Ladies and gentlemen!
Thank you all for waiting!
The 22nd Super Fight!
Here are all of our entrants!
First up is the Class A Rank 19 hero who is also known
as Lightning Max, entering for the first time!
Max from Hyper Karate!
I can only see myself winning.
Our only lady entrant!
Her lightning-speed attacks could be considered art.
Ring-Ring from Palm Bells Fist!
I want to fight already.
Next is Benpats from Bad Roads Martial Arts.
And now, one of our top four regulars!
His serpentine arms enclose his opponent and take them down!
The man ranked the lowest of the Class A heroes, Snek from Snakebite Fist!
Did you have to mention the lowest rank part?
We still have many more!
Always electrifying, Boltane from Fist of Thunder and Lightning!
Bazuzu from Bazuzu's Nuclear Fist!
Gatling from Many Striking Fists!
The kindred spirit from Sunflower Dojo's Gentle Art of Self-Defense, Hamukichi!
Dave from Crushing Giant Method!
Rosie from Psychoanalytic Martial Art!
Mentai from Spice Fist!
Jakumen from Giga Pro Wrestling!
Choze from Combat Arts of the Chosen People!
A former student of the Fist of Flowing Water Crushing Rock,
Sourface from Sourface-Style Kempo!
I am so nervous, I think I am going to puke...
This is his seventh consecutive entry!
Can this man who refuses to give up finally make it to the top?
Zakkos from Fist of Crazy Collision, Fierce Truth!
I am going to get my first victory and propose!
Next up...
We have a man who asked that no one go for his head on the surveys we handed out.
Did he really come here to fight?
Charanko from Fist of Water Polo, Carbonation!
Why am I getting booed already?
Is not that the Class S hero Genos?
Guess he likes martial arts, too.
And now for the strongest man in Super Fight history,
our returning two-time champion!
His fights are always one-sided.
But according to him, he has not even shown us all his strength yet.
Bakuzan from Art of the Darkness Hellkill!
There will finally be meaning in my victory today.
And we have another unrivaled contender!
He is returning for the first time in seven tournaments!
The young legend who managed to win four times in a row!
Suiryu from the Dark Body Art!
Yeah!
He spent the three years since he disappeared goofing off,
and apparently he is only after the prize money this time.
Is he so powerful because he does not crave fame or notoriety?
However, Bakuzan is also in this tournament.
So that is Suiryu...
If I can kill him, I will be the strongest man in the history of this tournament.
I can practically feel his boodlust piercing my back.
I actually wanted to fight the guy who won last year's tournament, though.
Now entering City Q
I wanted to play with someone stronger if I could.
Now that we have introduced our 18 entrants, let the 22nd Super Fight
begin!
Deep breaths, deep breaths...
I will be fine.
I will be fine.
I will be fine.
Hey, old guy, are you nervous?
Do not call me old guy!
I may be your senior, but I am twenty, just like you!
Wait, he is younger than me?
Hey, you.
You entered under a style I would never heard of.
You must be an amateur.
Do not take martial arts lightly.
Forfeit now,
or I will make you regret it.
Well, you heard him.
He is talking to you!
You cannot even tie your obi right.
You still cannot tie it correctly.
Here.
Super Fight is a premier martial arts tournament.
It is no place for amateurs.
This guy's also a student of the Fist of Flowing Water, Crushing Rock.
What?
Him?
I see...
Seems they will accept just about anyone these days.
What?
Bang was supposed to be one of the judges at this tournament,
but he caused a ruckus by canceling his appearance abruptly.
Master Bang?
The man called the strongest man in martial arts got wrapped up in being a hero.
That is enough out of you!
And wait, why are not you the one who is mad?!
Huh?
I already left the dojo, but you are the only student who stayed behind!
Oh, right.
I mean, just let him say whatever.
What?!
I did not come here to argue.
If you are threatening to crush me, I will look forward to it.
You do not look very strong, though.
Wow, way to put him in his place, Charanko.
I will beat you to a pulp.
I am fine with tracking down Garo, but is he really going to show?
Wow, you are definitely annoyed.
The Class A hero we were tracking is being attacked by someone.
What?
Let us go!
Boxing
I, the Boxing Demon, shall destroy this city!
Guess it was not Garo.
Stand back, Bomb.
Silverfang?
Perfect timing!
We should team Huh?
Um...
You must be a Class S hero!
I know you!
You are a famous martial artist!
When I was human, I also learned martial arts...
but fighting in competitions just was not enough!
That is right!
I wanted to let loose with all the strength I have, so I turned into a mon
D-Damn, he is strong...
Let us hurry, before he ends up like this.
And now, let us begin round one!
Round 1 Max vs Ring-Ring
Max versus Ring-Ring!
Fight!
Ring-Ring makes the first move!
Heart Hard Hit!
She did all that with one stroke of her whip?
You are a fool for thinking you could actually take me, Super S, on!
You pitiful, foolish hero brats!
H-Heavy Kong has been...
So this is what a Class A is like?
That was uneventful.
More importantly, make sure you spread the news
that the one who took down Heavy Kong was me, Martial Gorilla.
There is no end to this!
You are not getting away!
Th-They are the worst possible enemies I could have faced...
I see.
Despite the fact that we are only threat level Tiger,
we can defeat a Class A hero based on his attributes.
I guess we did not need to go sneaking around after all.
We got word that Heavy Kong was defeated in City W.
And we still have not been able to get a hold of Metal Bat or Metal Knight.
The giant organism that appeared in City I
has grown even bigger and harder after consuming a large building.
We cannot let it run loose any longer!
Poison!
The monster that appeared in City Y is using some kind of paralysis poison
to render the heroes there immobile!
It is no use.
There are just too many of them.
At this rate, we are going to be wiped out!
It seems that we, as well as the humans,
miscalculated how powerful the other was.
We are stronger than we expected,
and the humans are unexpectedly weak.
Stop!
Snap out of it!
Wh-What is wrong, Darkness Blade?!
Those who are lashed by my whip
become my love slaves as a result of the stimulation.
H-Hey, stop this!
Now, if you want my love, fight until you die!
Y-You are...
Oh?
Even more suitors to become my slaves?
How titillating!
Wow...
If that is all it takes to become a threat level Demon, today's my lucky day.
So if I defeat you, will that break your control over those men?
I can do something heroic and have them in my debt.
Two birds with one stone.
It is the Blizzard Bunch!
You are not getting away.
Do not tickle my sadism too much.
I am liable to get overstimulated and kill you.
Max KO'd Ring-Ring in no time!
Many were skeptical about just how strong he is as a martial artist,
so he had been placed in the reverse seed,
but he managed to win against a girl without a single scratch!
I would not say without a single scratch...
I guess he was still able to fight, even without explosives in his shoes.
Hey, what the heck is a reverse seed?
The weaker someone looks or is rumored to be,
the harder they make it for them to win the tournament.
I see.
So they thought he was weaker than most of the people here.
Those who switch from being a martial artist to a hero
are seen as having joined an easier occupation.
Winner Max
What about Bang, then?
Master Bang is a different story.
By the way, you also got the reverse seed.
Huh?
Oh, you are right.
Zakkos Charanko Bakuzan
So it is not that the guys on each end are strong,
but they are just treating me like I am weak?
No, those two were definitely strong.
Bakuzan, the one I fight after you, is favored to win this tournament.
So based on where you have been placed...
you must be weak, too.
Round two, Zakkos versus Charanko, is about to begin!
I am going to kill you...
Ch-Charanko's strong!
Did Zakkos's brain end up scrambled after that single slap?
Actually, I am not sure if Charanko's strong...
He is weak!
Zakkos is just so pathetically weak!
He apparently invited the person he would planned to propose to here,
but now there is been a huge change in his life plans!
Whoops.
I sorta feel bad.
Oh, we just got some new information.
Breaking News
Apparently, that person never came to the venue!
All clear!
They did not see him!
Oh, thank goodness.
There is nothing good about this...
Things played out as they usually do.
This tournament is likely to end
before Master has a chance to truly experience martial arts.
Zakkos had pretty good moves.
Guess I know who I am facing off with in the finals.
The Uprising of the Monsters
